column5: Is there a limit on how much gasoline you can take into Canada? My boat has a 60 gallon tank. If it is full, is it going to be a problem? Thanks.
[font color=green size=3][b]Filling the boat tank would be considered a reasonable amount of fuel and shouldn't be a problem. But I gotta ask what manufacturer puts a 60 gal. tank on a Walleye boat?
Hi. I have a lund tyee 19 footer andit has 40 gallons. I believe a lund barron has 60. Its holds a lot but then it sucks up a lot too. after 3 days it has to be filled.again.
My Pro-V 1175 holds 32 gallons. My Expedition holds 30. I can go all week in Canada w/o filling up. I can go about 4 1/2 hours in my vehicle.

- Dad's old 14 ft. alumni boat with 25 HP - free - Gas filled 6 gallon tank - $13.00 - Getting stranded in the middle of Lac Seul and beating the h3ll out of your fishing buddy because he forgot the back-up tank: priceless
